result.arabic_text: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَقَدۡ بَلَغَنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ وَٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٞۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱللَّهُ يَفۡعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ
result.translation: (Zakariya) aravuga ati “Nyagasani wanjye! Ni gute nagira umuhungu kandi ngeze mu zabukuru n’umugore wanjye akaba ari urubereri?” Aravuga ati “Ni ko bimeze; Allah akora ibyo ashaka.”
